body: ### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe. Filtering doesn't have methods. Here I'm looking for `Workflow.DelayAsync`: ### Describe the solution you'd like Filter working for more things, or a search box elsewhere on page. ### Additional context Workaround is googling for `site:https://dotnet.temporal.io delayasync` but it doesn't take me to the right anchor, just the top of the page https://dotnet.temporal.io/api/Temporalio.Workflows.Workflow.html

comments.body: We use https://dotnet.github.io/docfx/, so it'd be dependent upon what they support.
Closing as not something we can reasonably do since we use the language-standard documentation generator

title: [Feature Request] Add search to API reference
